body_html:
It is really helpful to see loss & accuracy right next to each other. I think it would be a great feature to have as a default setting. And it really is important to see the loss for training and validation together -- to see if they begin to diverge.

A rough proposal (not styled for TensorBoard, but still):
body_text:
It is really helpful to see loss & accuracy right next to each other. I think it would be a great feature to have as a default setting. And it really is important to see the loss for training and validation together -- to see if they begin to diverge.
A rough proposal (not styled for TensorBoard, but still):
body:
It is really helpful to see _loss_ & _accuracy_ right next to each other. I think it would be a great feature to have as a default setting. And it _really_ is important to see the loss for _training_ and _validation_ together -- to see if they begin to diverge.

A rough proposal (not styled for TensorBoard, but still):

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17264277/43359820-7acb6e02-9277-11e8-9fac-2b57a8bc4529.png)
